description.en: Here you will find the vocabulary from Unit 7 - 7A in the Solutions Upper-Intermediate coursebook, such as "falsehood", "distort", "hypocritical", etc.
description.id: Di sini Anda akan menemukan kosa kata dari unit 7 - 7a dalam solusi buku kursus menengah atas, seperti "kepalsuan", "distorsi", "munafik", dll.
